projects.name: Pirate Assassin
projects.shortDesc: Pirate Assassin is a RPG game features gameplay systems including combat system, skills, animations, quests, and inventory management.
highlights: The movement system has various basic movements, including running, jumping, wall climbing, and vaulting
The combat system allow the player to engage in melee combat, archery, block attacks with a shield, and perform evasive rolls to dodge incoming attacks.
Inventory system enables players to gather loot through exploration, defeating enemies, or completing quests.
Implemented quest and save system to cope with game data

projects.name: Technical Artist Works
projects.shortDesc: Unreal Engine has high-quality materials and effects, which inspired me to dive deep into their creation.Through continuous learning and experimentation, I strive to push the visual quality of my work to match UE's high standards.
highlights: Innovated a ping-pong rendering system for seamless scene transitions.
Engineered a browser-based scene editor for real-time animation editing by animators.
Conceptualized and implemented interactive particle effects and sand transitions using shader.

detail.value: This is an interactive snow material that dynamically deforms with footprints by rendering a height map. The system uses a Render Target as a canvas to capture foot patterns via ray tracing and applies them to the snow surface in real time. To handle large scenes, the canvas moves with the character, preserving footprints and fading distant ones. Snow buildup is simulated by blurring footprints, generating a height map to represent depth. Realistic lighting and terrain displacement are achieved using normal maps and Virtual Heightfield Mesh.

This effect simulates a natural transformation between two objects. The dynamic material gradually turns the original object red before fading it out, while a Niagara particle stream flows from the original object to the target, visually linking the transformation. As the particles reach the target, a new object appears, creating a smooth and immersive morphing effect.

I created dynamic materials to simulate transformations like freezing and melting transformations. By adding masks, noise, UV manipulation and special techniques like Fresnel highlights to a base texture to add depth and realism to the material.
